entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 07:55 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure: 103.5 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.4°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
